mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.return_code AS "returnCode", a.return_msg AS "returnMsg", a.appid AS "appid", a.mch_id AS "mchId", a.device_info AS "deviceInfo", a.nonce_str AS "nonceStr", a.sign AS "sign", a.result_code AS "resultCode", a.err_code AS "errCode", a.err_code_des AS "errCodeDes", a.openid AS "openid", a.is_subscribe AS "isSubscribe", a.trade_type AS "tradeType", a.bank_type AS "bankType", a.total_fee AS "totalFee", a.fee_type AS "feeType", a.cash_fee AS "cashFee", a.cash_fee_type AS "cashFeeType", a.coupon_fee AS "couponFee", a.coupon_count AS "couponCount", a.transaction_id AS "transactionId", a.out_trade_no AS "outTradeNo", a.attach AS "attach", a.time_end AS "timeEnd", a.promotion_detail AS "promotionDetail", a.version AS "version", a.settlement_total_fee AS "settlementTotalFee", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM order_payment_weixin_callback a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM order_payment_weixin_callback a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_payment_weixin_callback( id, return_code, return_msg, appid, mch_id, device_info, nonce_str, sign, result_code, err_code, err_code_des, openid, is_subscribe, trade_type, bank_type, total_fee, fee_type, cash_fee, cash_fee_type, coupon_fee, coupon_count, transaction_id, out_trade_no, attach, time_end, promotion_detail, version, settlement_total_fee, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{returnCode}, #{returnMsg}, #{appid}, #{mchId}, #{deviceInfo}, #{nonceStr}, #{sign}, #{resultCode}, #{errCode}, #{errCodeDes}, #{openid}, #{isSubscribe}, #{tradeType}, #{bankType}, #{totalFee}, #{feeType}, #{cashFee}, #{cashFeeType}, #{couponFee}, #{couponCount}, #{transactionId}, #{outTradeNo}, #{attach}, #{timeEnd}, #{promotionDetail}, #{version}, #{settlementTotalFee}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_payment_weixin_callback SET return_code = #{returnCode}, return_msg = #{returnMsg}, appid = #{appid}, mch_id = #{mchId}, device_info = #{deviceInfo}, nonce_str = #{nonceStr}, sign = #{sign}, result_code = #{resultCode}, err_code = #{errCode}, err_code_des = #{errCodeDes}, openid = #{openid}, is_subscribe = #{isSubscribe}, trade_type = #{tradeType}, bank_type = #{bankType}, total_fee = #{totalFee}, fee_type = #{feeType}, cash_fee = #{cashFee}, cash_fee_type = #{cashFeeType}, coupon_fee = #{couponFee}, coupon_count = #{couponCount}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}, attach = #{attach}, time_end = #{timeEnd}, promotion_detail = #{promotionDetail}, version = #{version}, settlement_total_fee = #{settlementTotalFee}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
